Text:
On most of the files of this sort, there are nut jobs telling US that we're crazy for buying into this, etc, etc etc, when it's actually THEM that need to wake up. I watched Dr. Ray Griffin's 911 Myths and the 'In Plane Sight' films and knew that the suspicions I had from day one were correct. 
Some people will never wake up though. They just can't handle the truth.
